mapper.insert: insert into file_ (parentId, name_, directory_, isDir, userId, size, createDate, serverLocation) values (#{parentId}, #{name}, #{directory}, #{isDir}, #{userId}, #{size}, #{createDate}, #{serverLocation})
mapper.select: select * from file_ where name like concat('%', #{fuzzyFileName}, '%')
select * from file_ where userId = #{userId} and parentId = -1
select sum(size) from file_ where userId = #{userId}
